programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: Why Entry Level Jobs are Not Entry Level & Working From Home
programme.desc: Stop me if you’ve heard this one before. An entry level job paying eight dollars an hour with no benefits at an unremarkable company… Oh and they want you to have at least three years’ experience in a similar role and preferably a masters degree... Searching for a job is a difficult and time-consuming task. Most Americans do not have enough savings to survive for more than two weeks without going into debt which means it is also stressful. No matter how efficient the hiring process is made you are never going to have fun looking for a job and nothing can change that, but the corporate world has started to introduce a lot of obstacles that make the JOB of FINDING a JOB as painful as possible. It’s also simply bad business. Attracting the right talent is vital for business success. If businesses make their application process too difficult, they are going to filter out everybody but the most desperate candidates, which are rarely the BEST candidates. Companies that ask for multiple years of experience from applicants applying for entry level jobs also expose themselves to a similar risk. It might sound advantageous for the business to get an employee with years of experience that they can pay like a fresh graduate, but company management frequently overlook the reason that these applicants are looking for entry level jobs in a field they have been working in for years is that they are not that good at their job and they need to keep moving companies before their poor performance catches up with them. A recent study conducted by Portland State University and published by the Harvard Business Review found that overqualified candidates did not outperform the control group and that paying significantly under market rates for talent will cost most businesses more in other areas. Multiple rounds of interviews also take paid hours from HR, hiring managers and third-party recruiters. Recruiters work on a commission basis for successfully placed candidates, but if a company makes candidates go through multiple rounds of int

programme.title: You Suck at Investing & Is it too late to get ahead financially
programme.desc: Investing is the most important thing you can do to reliably build wealth during your life. The only problem is… you inevitably suck at it… The S&P 500 has a historical average return of 10.4 over the past 100 years, even when including all the major stock market downturns during that time. $10,000 invested in 1972 would be worth $1.7 Million today. But look around, and you will be hard pressed to find anybody who has made themselves wealthy EXCLUSIVELY through diligent investing practices. Research done by Dalbar Inc an investment research firm found that the average equity fund investor only made average annualized returns of 4.25 over the past 20 years. To understand how big a difference this truly is, the same investor getting those returns would only turn their initial $10,000 investment into $83,000 today over the same 50 year period.People are terrible at investing, YOU are terrible at investing, and even finance industry professionals are buy and large… terrible at investing.

programme.title: "Retirement for a Dream Home, Moore's Law, and the Power of Words"
programme.desc: Investment advisor Ric Edelman answers the question if its a good idea to dip into your retirement nest egg to buy your dream home; interviews Rob Nail about how Moores Law will impact humanitys future; and Jean Edelman explores the power of words.

programme.title: "Financial Goals, Elder Care, & Baseball Economics"
programme.desc: Ric explains how setting and meeting goals can help improve your financial future; answers TV studio audience question about caring for an aging parent; continues his conversation with baseball legend Nolan Ryan about the economics of baseball.

programme.title: Your Money Your Wealth: 5 Money Mistakes That Can Sabotage Your Retirement
programme.desc: When it comes to retirement, sometimes the things you dont do can be more costly than the things you do. Are you your own worst enemy? One reason people make those mistakes is that they dont know where to go for advice. much less what they should be doing. Your retirement involves more than just opening a savings account and forgetting all about it. You have to know your goals for retirement, and then perhaps alter your lifestyle to meet those goals. The ""Dynamic Duo"" of financial planning, Joe Anderson, CFP, and Alan Clopine, CPA, help you avoid some very costly mistakes that could sabotage your retirement.

programme.title: Financial Boot Camp
programme.desc: Stocks and bonds, 401(k)s and IRAs - how investment savvy are you? Less than half of Americans have a solid understanding of basic investing terms and concepts. It can be difficult to grow your wealth if you dont know what tools and strategies are available, much less know how to use them to develop a long-term financial plan. From investing basics to retirement plan funding options, Joe Anderson CFP and Alan Clopine, CPA, take you to financial boot camp to help increase your investing IQ.

programme.title: You Suck at Investing & Is it too late to get ahead financially
programme.desc: Investing is the most important thing you can do to reliably build wealth during your life. The only problem is… you inevitably suck at it… The S&P 500 has a historical average return of 10.4 over the past 100 years, even when including all the major stock market downturns during that time. $10,000 invested in 1972 would be worth $1.7 Million today. But look around, and you will be hard pressed to find anybody who has made themselves wealthy EXCLUSIVELY through diligent investing practices. Research done by Dalbar Inc an investment research firm found that the average equity fund investor only made average annualized returns of 4.25 over the past 20 years. To understand how big a difference this truly is, the same investor getting those returns would only turn their initial $10,000 investment into $83,000 today over the same 50 year period.People are terrible at investing, YOU are terrible at investing, and even finance industry professionals are buy and large… terrible at investing.

programme.title: How Venture Capital Works & Blackstone vs Blackrock
programme.desc: Venture capital is a two hundred- and fifty-billion-dollar industry that takes your money whether you know it or not and puts it into promising start-ups like, FTX, Theranos, and WeWork but what do these people actually do all day and how are they different from private equity or hedge funds? Venture capital is a type of private equity and private equity is any investment made into a non-public company or security. A private equity fund raises money from investors to buy companies or other assets that are not listed on public exchanges and use them to generate returns. Private companies are much less transparent then public companies which are forced by the SEC and the exchanges to publish financials every quarter in addition to other information that they must keep current. Private companies are also harder to buy or sell since you can’t just open your Robinhood app and buy some shares. The difficulty and illiquidity of dealing with private companies means that investors expect higher returns and the managers running the funds can charge higher fees to compensate them for the extra work. They achieve those high returns through a number of different strategies, one strategy is a buyout fund that will take investor money, take out a large loan on top of that money and use it to buy a large established company that can be made more efficient by laying off staff and improving processes. Another private equity strategy is the rescue fund that buys a failing business for cheap and tries to turn it around, usually by laying off staff and improving processes. But if you don’t have the stomach for firing people all day then Venture Capital is the type of private equity for you. Most of the private equity industry works with established private companies but venture capital invest into businesses that are just getting started. Some private equity investments will be made into businesses that are nothing more than some ideas drawn on a napkin. But what does that actually involve doing? You wake up one day and find out you

programme.desc: Somewhere along the border with Mexico, two lifelong friends - prospectors - use moth eaten maps and passed down legends in a lifelong search to find a ghost ship rumored to have been buried in the desert sand over millennia as the seafloor dried up. Today, Mexican drug lords operate here, using a fleet of children in ultra light airplanes, flying in a new type of treasure - heroin - modern gold dust. These two friends must decide between pursuing their dreams of treasure, suddenly so close, and what they know is right. To save themselves, or risk their lives to save a young girl captive to the drug lord. GOLD DUST is a wild adventure of treasure and ghosts, mirages and orphans, shattered dreams and lost loves. It blends the stark deadly beauty of the desert with a villain so disarmingly dangerous he becomes terrifyingly elegant. Classical music. Thundering opera. Rattlesnakes and precious gems. Mansions and gold mines. Friendship and despair. Hope. Death. And Love. Treasure beyond imagination always vanishes in the desert wind.

programme.desc: Es el informativo estelar del canal, con las últimas noticias del acontecer político, social, deportivo y cultural de China y el resto del mundo. Los hechos que constituyen titulares están aquí, en CGTN Noticias.

programme.title: PRISMA
programme.desc: Prisma es un programa cultural producido por CGTN en español en colaboración con el multimedio de comunicación latinoamericano teleSUR. Su objetivo es mostrar a los televidentes la riqueza cultural de China y el mundo hispanohablante, elevar el conocimiento de la cultura china en los países de habla hispana y establecer una plataforma de diálogo entre ambas partes. Se trata de un programa mensual de 30 minutos de duración que comenzó a emitirse en agosto de 2016. Está compuesto de tres segmentos que destacan por su diversidad temática. Primero, un espacio de noticias culturales; después, una semblanza de alguna personalidad del ámbito cultural latinoamericano; y finalmente un documental sobre aspectos de la cultura china.

programme.title: CGTN NOTICIAS

programme.title: CAFÉ DE CGTN

Clipper: The Race Of Their Lives (Ep4)
Kayaking the 'Canadian Amazon'
programme.desc: Big Creek in Southern Ontario's Norfolk County is commonly referred to as ‘the Canadian Amazon’ as it winds its way through thick forest, while presenting paddlers with a natural obstacle course of fallen trees. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores this ecological wonder from the seat of his kayak.

programme.title: Whitewater Canoeing the Madawaska River - Part 1
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he hops in a whitewater solo canoe for the first time ever and attempts to put his whitewater paddling skills to the test on the Madawaska River.

programme.title: Pathfinder
programme.desc: Life Beyond Fear. Pathfinder is a tale about the human spirit.The film follows six world-class slackliners (Highliners) on a mission deep into the Norwegian mountains to attempt something that’s never been seen before: Walking a thin line, elevated in the vastness between two colossal cliffs, illuminated only by the mystical northern lights.

programme.title: Snowboard Test
programme.desc: Join Teton Gravity Research's stacked team at Squaw Valley as they test out new snowboards from across the industry.

programme.title: Pathfinder
programme.desc: Life Beyond Fear. Pathfinder is a tale about the human spirit.The film follows six world-class slackliners (Highliners) on a mission deep into the Norwegian mountains to attempt something that’s never been seen before: Walking a thin line, elevated in the vastness between two colossal cliffs, illuminated only by the mystical northern lights.

programme.title: Welcome to Nain
programme.desc: In March 2019, Estski realized a backcountry skiing expedition in Nunatsiavut, an Inuit-owned autonomous territory of the Province of Newfoundland and Labrador (Canada). More specifically, in two areas around the village of Nain in Labrador: Fraser Canyon and Kiglapait mountains. These mountains and canyons are very little visited in winter and several locals even mentioned that they had never seen anyone ski these corridors.

programme.title: Paradice
programme.desc: In winter, the Alps turn into a paradise for top alpine sports. Huge waterfalls freeze to ice and leave unique formations. Paradice shows three of the most beautiful Swiss ice climbing tours from an unusual perspective. A film about risk, responsibility and the beauty of nature. A film featuring Jonas Schild, Nicolas Hojac and Stephan Siegrist.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking the 1000 Islands
programme.desc: The crystal-clear waters of Lake Ontario are home to a spectacular group of islands known as the 1000 Islands – and there’s 1000 good reasons to visit. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores the must-see local paddling spots by sea kayak.

programme.title: Canadian Stunts
programme.desc: Head up to Western Canada with TGR and Anthill Films as they do their best to film a segment despite adverse weather and injuries during the filming of unReal, TGR's 2015 bike film.

programme.title: Gone Tomorrow
programme.desc: Ice climbing in Kentucky?! This adventure documentary takes the audience for a bourbon-fueled ride deep into the bushy hollers of Appalachia with a crew of harmless misfits as they race to search out and climb new ice routes before they're gone, with a few surprises along the way.

programme.title: TGR Turns 21
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research team for a celebration of 21 years of pushing the limits of what's possible in winter sports. Featuring highlights from TGR's best segments, you shouldn't miss this!

programme.title: Moss Trophy
programme.desc: A race for closed-cockpit GT cars from before 1963, including the Jaguar E-type, Ferrari 250 SWB, and Aston Martin DB4GT, evoking the golden era of GT racing.

programme.title: FIM QuadX EMX European Championship
programme.desc: FIM European Quadcross is back for round one of the 2024 season from Alqueidao in central Portugal.

programme.title: FIM X-Trial
programme.desc: The sixth scoring event for the 2024 X-Trial World Championship, returns once again to Tallinn, Estonia

programme.title: FIA GT Single Make (Ferrari Challenge)
programme.desc: A one-make race using Ferrari race cars, ensuring close competition.

programme.title: Petersen Automotive Museum: Global Garage
programme.desc: Were in Denver, Colorado exploring the car collection, garage and facility of RaceKraft & Design. George Frey, owner, enthusiast, and racer takes us through the facility and collection.

programme.title: Michelin 12H Misano
programme.desc: Endurance racing heads to Italy as the 24H Series takes on the iconic Misano World Circuit. GTs and touring cars battle through the night in this demanding 12-hour showdown under the lights of the Adriatic coast.

programme.title: P1 Offshore Powerboats
programme.desc: Lake of the Ozarks is a reservoir created by impounding the Osage River in the northern part of the Ozarks in central Missouri.

programme.title: Quilt Basics
programme.desc: Get started with the basics for traditional quilting. What could be more basic than quilting for home decor and apparel? Rebecca Kemp Brent has a demonstration on free motion and guided quilting to hold a kaleidoscope applique in place, plus a short discussion on fusibles and needles. Then, Angela Wolf demonstrates ruching with elastic thread.

programme.title: Trends
programme.desc: The first episode is all about the trends. Angela Wolf introduces our trendy top, perfect for every occasion, size and style – sew along with eight different lessons this season on a specific element of the top. Then it’s a trending accessory and a cross body bag with Kay Whitt. Finally meet Ebony Love for our first quilt block – stay tuned over the season for five different blocks AND five unique projects utilizing your starter block.

programme.title: Heirloom Cabochons
programme.desc: Using colorful fabric, blogger Mandi Ainsworth fashions cabochons to create heirlooms using a new twist on traditional techniques. Mandi makes a bezel with seed beads to create timeless pendants, bracelets and necklaces. Katie shows how to tie knots in leather strips to create a fashion-forward necklace.

programme.title: Wire as the Artists' Muse
programme.desc: Inspiration can come from a style, an artist, or the material itself. Today's artists get their creative jump start from wire. Our feature bead type is lamp work beads and soft glass vs borosilicate. Then, artist Brenda Schweder is back with a Calder inspired modern, wire art necklace. Then, inventor Wyatt White takes wire weaving to a new level making an intricate bangle.

programme.title: Details
programme.desc: Adding new details keeps things fresh. Christine Drumheller adds texture as she designs with thread using the sewing machine. Amy Tan sprays and spatters paint for special effects. Julie Fei-Fan Balzer wraps it all up with a review of the fresh new techniques featured throughout the series.

programme.title: Time Travels
programme.desc: The theme for this episode is traveling back in time, as we are inspired by history. First host Julie Fei Fan Balzer creates a landscape viewed through antique glass. It's a unique perspective fueled by a photo. Then Michael deMeng has a Day of the Dead inspired project using figurines. Last, we join Cat Kerr for a crown reminiscent of medieval times but perfect for your favorite princess today

programme.desc: Learn to knit with CraftsyTV.

programme.title: Knitting

programme.title: Stash-Friendly Criss Cross Quilt
programme.desc: In the final episode of the Holiday Gift-Along, your last-minute gift quilter, Angela Walters, is making a beginner-friendly criss cross quilt. This gift-able quilt project is much easier than it looks, so you still have time to make it before the holidays!

programme.title: Birthday
programme.desc: Talia breaks down, while Nimrod is partying. Uri and Nurit try to bridge the gap after 17 years. After meeting Yinon, Yael puts Amiel's items in storage. Haim further investigates Amiel's whereabouts. Yussuf and Abdullah handle an arms deal.

programme.title: Rom-Coms
programme.desc: Hosts Gregory Cohen and Bella Glanville will have what she's having when they discuss the romantic comedies that have made the biggest impact in the past 40 years, including Princess Bride, Pretty Woman, Jerry Maguire, Wedding Singer and more!

programme.title: The Birth of Samson
programme.desc: Samson was born during a tense time in Israel's history, when the nation was at war with its enemy, the Philistines. Samson's parents had been having a hard time conceiving. We meet the angel who bore good news, and learn G-d blesses Samson.

programme.title: Samson Goes to Timnah
programme.desc: Samson grows up and is attracted to the ways of the Philistines. He goes to Timnah, marries a Philistine woman, until his death in the Philistine Temple.

programme.title: Besa, A Code of Honor

programme.title: The Return of the Violin
programme.desc: The stunning story of a 1731 stolen Stradivarius violin once owned by Israeli Philharmonic founder Bronislaw Huberman. Lost for decades, Jewish American virtuoso Joshua Bell ultimately purchased the recovered violin and plays in Czestochowa, Poland.

programme.title: EVEN TRADE
programme.desc: Childhood friendships mean nothing, when power and money come into play. There are brothers, and then there are best friends. Bonded in crime, now divided in their deep desire to become legitimate. Is Blood really thicker than water? Or, will water wash the blood away? Who stays in the street? Who stays uptown? Even Trade - When no deals a good deal.

programme.title: INVISIBLE YOUNG
programme.desc: Over a four-year period, Rachel lived on the streets of Seattle, saw close friends die, and she was herself beaten on several occasions. Michael was five years old when he was placed in foster care. Over the next 11 years, Michael would see over 70 different placements. Several times he ran away - life on the streets was more to his liking. Jacklyn grew up with a mother who was a perfect candidate for the TV show Hoarders. Jacklyn describes her father as a violent, abusive, alcoholic drug addict. So at 13 when a friend took her to meet some homeless kids living under a bridge in town, Jacklyn knew she had found a new life. She would spend the next eight years on the streets. Jackson had a more traditional home life. But early exposure to drugs in his teen years resulted in Jackson choosing homelessness upon graduating high school. After several years hopping trains and living on the streets, a near brush with death forced him to reassess his situation.

programme.title: The Date
programme.desc: A date that turned into a nightmare, thanks to the rat trio. With a spring in his step, all Doggy Don wanted was a romantic and quiet date with his girlfriend. After being drenched in Chili Sauce, bathed in cement, and brushing with Dynamite, Its surprising that there was any bit of him left for the date. But Alas the trios are the rightful owners of the last laugh!

programme.title: WANTED
programme.desc: The street circus from which Basha escaped, returns to the village. And they see Basha running all around Hotel California. And they decide to get their ex-star attraction at any cost. Now Sundar teams up with the circus guys to catch Basha once and for all. The circus guys are putting up a really hilarious show trying to catch Basha; with Sundars silly attempts in between. But Basha is too smart for all of them. At last the circus guys run away for their dear lives!!!

programme.title: Blackberry Tea
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: An Alien Visit
programme.desc: It’s a nice cold night and Keet is resting on the terrace of the house enjoying the night stars. Suddenly a small space ship crash lands on the terrace and a cute little alien the same size of Keet comes out.

programme.title: Hula Hoop
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: APPRENTICE ALERT
programme.desc: Chai Raja is in his inventive mood and rigging up a new treat for his customers. In streak Basha chased by Sundar and the two mess around the kitchen while Chai Raja has stepped out for a second. As he tosses stuff to keep Sundar at bay, Basha accidentally makes a couple of special jalebis. Chai Raja steps back in and the two freeze mid-motion. Chai Raja scoops out the simmering jalebis and sniffs, his nose wrinkling. Sundar eagerly points at Basha sure that the monkey is sure to get in trouble this time, but much to his chagrin, Basha is hired- as an apprentice!! As Sundar glumly waits at the tables, Basha (the show-off) not only builds an acrobatic rapport with Chai Raja and makes life miserable for Sundar, but also manages to gobble up fries on the sly. Sundar has to find some means of getting Basha fired and tries to sneak in and mess with Bashas batter. But he ends up only making it better and earning Basha more pats on his back. The MP arrives and Chai Raja wants to show off his new apprentices skills Basha is in the spotlight and sure to crack under the heat. Sundar, meanwhile ready to be rid of Basha in any manner possible, sticks dynamite in the batter. Basha, stumped as to what to cook , hastily shapes up the batter into an inviting cake. Seeing a wick, the MP lights it- and slices...KABOOM! Both Basha and Sundar, trod with heavy shoulders out the tea stall as a charred Chai Raja signals they are fired.

programme.title: Shivery Timbers
programme.desc: Mildred the ghost has had just about enough of the Creepy Candys noisy shenanigans and wants the library quiet.It is then the Creepy Candy find a secret treasure map and decide to follow it. The clues lead our daring swashbucklers on a high seas adventure of danger and mystery.Will they discover a hidden treasure? What will it begold, jewels, chocolate? Will Mildred ever be happy? Watch this exciting episode of Shivery Timbers and find out!

programme.title: Charlies Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: AWARD PE AWARD
programme.desc: A local committee makes a surprise visit to hotel Kelifornia and presents Chai Raja with the Best Chef Award. Chai Raja is thrilled and places the award on the shelf and gives the duty of safe-guarding it to Sundar. And suddenly Basha develops a fascination for the trophy. Instantly, poor Sundars life turns into living hell. Things reach a crazy climax when the trophy from Sundars hands falls on the ground and breaks into a hundred pieces right in front of Chai Rajas eyes. Chai Raja is literally shivering in fury, Sundar is literally shivering in fear and Basha is literally shivering trying to control his laughter. And that very moment the local committee comes again with a larger trophy. A surprised Chai Raja gracefully takes a bow to accept yet another award. But to everyones sheer shock, the committee gives the trophy to Sundar for being the best waiter. And Chai Raja and Basha faint instantly...followed by Sundar!!!

programme.title: Be a Friend, Make a Friend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: CHOR MACHAYE SHOR
programme.desc: Chai Raja is down with fever and needs to rest. He gives Sundar the charge of the tea stall on 2 conditions; one, he will make sure the customers get their orders on time and second he mustnt be disturbed. Basha overhears it and is enthralled. Sundar is ready for the assignment and so is Basha. Hapless Sundar has to struggle and juggle himself between his hungry customers, his sleeping master and fighting the villain of his life-BASHA.

programme.title: What CeCe Saw
programme.desc: Upon discovering the Creepy Candy TM fooling around in his secret laboratory again, Victor crams them into his lunchbox. Soon after, he bumps into CeCe OMalley, the new girl at school, and their lunchboxes accidently get switched. Once Victor realizes this He chases after CeCe to keep her from opening the lunchbox.Can Victor get to her in time before she opens the lunchbox? Can he stop her from discovering his secret about the Creepy Candy TM? Will Cece learn about the other creepy secrets the old library holds?

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift – a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house – for the first time. But how???

programme.title: Sneezils
programme.desc: When Sneevil creates the Sneezils flu, all the Smighties get infected, except for Zip who has to take care of them while defending the Castle from Villains.

programme.title: Double Role
programme.desc: ‘Ting tong’ .. Cat opens the door to sees a milk bowl at the door step. He slurps it up and ‘ZAP’ a Cat clone is formed.

programme.title: Hill Resort
programme.desc: Dunky, Keet and Cat arrive at a nearby hill station with GrandPA for a small holiday, just in time to realize that the local monkeys are not so friendly. A mad chase follows between the monkeys and the three of them .

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: TEA-PORIS
programme.desc: A gang of biker taporis come to hotel Kelifornia one day. They are such menacing baddies that they play all sorts of funny pranks with Sundar. Sundar being the sincere waiter takes it all until he is so sad that Sundar goes behind the hotel all sad and disappointed. Though Basha loves messing with Sundar, he cant take the bikers messing with Sundar. And our super smart Basha decides to give the bikers a heavier dose of their own medicine. What we see then is Basha in full Ranjikant style and adas punishing the rouge bikers in the most hilarious ways. And an excited Sundar doesnt forget to reward Basha generously with his favourite snacks. And in no time the tapori bikers flee for their dear lives.

programme.title: BITTEN BY BUG
programme.desc: Buzz falls head over heels for a mysterious, secret admirer who just moved into the library. Suspicious of her true motives, Googly and Iris try to warn Buzz that he knows nothing about his new friend and that she may not be as nice as she seems, but he ignores their advice. After agreeing to meet his new friend for lunch, Buzz learns the hard way that love can really hurt - literally. Watch the brand new, full episode here and find out how Buzz got a boo boo, and why he needed an emergency ride in an ambulance to see the doctor, in another exciting adventure of Creepy Candy

programme.title: Friends or Foes
programme.desc: Its friendship day and Dunky makes both Keet and Cat share friendship bands with each other and makes them promise to maintain friendship for a day at least.

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: WHATS IN A NAME
programme.desc: Sundar is trying to oust Basha as usual from the shop when he accidentally damages the signboard of the tea-shop. Moustache bristling, Chai Raja assigns Sundar the task of painting a new signboard for the tea shop but Basha is all set to botch it up. Each time Sundar paints on the hotels name, Basha streaks in wrecking havoc. he sometimes adds unnecessary caricatures of Chai Raja to the signboard, at yet others tweaks the spelling and even adjusts it so that it falls on a couple of unsuspecting customers causing Chai Rajas heart to palpitate. Sundar better pull up his paws and get on with the job for Chai Raja is as fond of his hotels exotic name as he is of serving up his exotic brews. FinallySundar loses and a mad chase and crash against the kitchen counter Sundar gulps sure that he is going to get the boot...but Chai Raja is grinning. The new signboard goes up and gets a big thumbs-up from everyone it spells the hotel name in tea-stains (with banana fritters and tea sieves interspersed). Sundar heaves a sigh of relief...for once!

programme.title: Ice cream Song
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: YesYouCan
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: MONDO YAWN
programme.desc: Maestro Woof is having trouble sleeping. The Guardians try to cure his insomnia. The other Elders make a sleeping tonic, but Pai mistakes it for lemonade and drinks it. Xia and April discover a Mutant Raccoon from Negu is keeping Maestro Woof awake. Pai “sleep-fights” the raccoon brilliantly, but can’t do it when he’s awake. With the Elders’ help, the Guardians defeat the raccoon. Worn out, Maestro Woof falls asleep.

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: The Happy Prince
programme.desc: The south-bound Swallow sits on the Happy Prince statue. However, unlike its name the Prince statue is crying. The Swallow postpones his trip and decides to help the Prince.

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: Paper Plate
programme.desc: Simple yet the possibilities are endless, Hepi and Briko surprise us with their ideas

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Speed decides its time for an all out assault on the Shadowy Organization. They manage to get the part back, but in the process Speed Sr. is captured. The kids have to save dad and eventually do, but they discover that Speed and Xs mom is Trixie, leader of the Shadowy org

programme.title: Coco Jumbo
programme.desc: It’s the time of the month when the coconuts from the trees have to be removed to be send the market for sale. GrandPA has entrusted Dunky to do this job.

programme.title: Pinecone
programme.desc: Creativity has no limits, watch Hepi and Briko transform these cones into something lovely

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Speed decides its time for an all out assault on the Shadowy Organization. They manage to get the part back, but in the process Speed Sr. is captured. The kids have to save dad and eventually do, but they discover that Speed and Xs mom is Trixie, leader of the Shadowy org.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: Tommy’s Got Talent
programme.desc: Charlie and the twins are practising for Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest. Deedee isn’t contesting as she didn’t get any time to practice. The twins have a tough time dancing in step with Uncle Charlie’s drum beat. Deedee tries to help them with a remembering spell, but Nino points out that it wouldn’t be fair to use magic in a contest. So Deedee and Nino walk along wishing the twins are able to perfect their act in time. Mewmew si struggling with a juggling act, so Deedee tries to help by conjuring a catching spell, but Nino reminds her it’s wrong just in time. Luciano haughtily sings as he walks. But Deedee and Nino hear an even more beautiful tune emanating from Tommy Prickles house. But Tommy is not too confident to sing in the presence of others. So Deedee comes up with a non-magic way to help. Happy at what Deedee suggests, Tommy decides to enroll. The fabulous prize is Tiggy’s very own specially made jelly. The winner is decided by who gets the highest ovation as measured on the clap-o-meter. Charlie and the twins perform outstandingly, so does Mewmew the juggling rabbit, Luciano’s opera all of whom get loud ovations. Finally it is Tommy prickles turn, but he isn’t able to keep his eyes closed like Deedee suggested him to, making his singing come to an abrupt stop. Deedee asks the audience if they could close their eyes to help Tommy sing. That was all Tommy needed to sing so very melodiously. The clap-o-meter does a full spin and points to the highest score ever. Tommy is declared the winner of Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest, that too without magic a wee bit.

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: The Garden Guardians
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to take care of their vegetable garden while they go on a trip. Xia and April think it’s the dullest job ever, but Pai is over the moon. Negu seizes the chance to send his Mutant Beetles, who try to wreck the garden, making Pai’s life impossible. He has to use a secret known only to the most green-fingered gardeners to beat the Mutants and save the garden.

programme.title: The Egg
programme.desc: Gummy wakes up with a mysterious egg in his bedroom – and, over Harry’s objections, becomes convinced that it’s ‘Junior’, a future soccer star!

programme.title: Planet Gadget
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: Petunias – Snow White Case 3
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of SNOW WHITE, where they find her and the 7 DWARVES asleep around the table. The lethal apple has mysteriously fallen into the soup cauldron and they have all been poisoned. SANDRA comes up with a possible solution: to find, in addition to the PRINCE, 7 DWARF PRINCESSES capable of awaking the DWARVES with a kiss of love. The evil STEPMOTHER will do everything she can to prevent her.

programme.title: Dancing Boots
programme.desc: There are a pair of boots in the window of the Fortune Tellers shop and theyre not for sale as theyre enchanted. Hoping that the boots will give him wonderful powers, Aladdin slips them on and finds himself dancing. Its funny and he loves it, until he tries to stop and cant and so out he dances into the street. Jamillah runs for Genie and together they find some tricky, funny way to waylay Aladdin and remove the boots.

programme.title: “How To Ride A Bike”
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: Fred’s Close Shave
programme.desc: Fred wishes he could look older, so Nora would like him as much as her pop star crush “Romeo Romero.” When he learns about the hair growth bugs that made Brains grow a beard-- he purposely uses them on himself. Now, whenever Friday shaves it off their beards, they grow back longer!

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: Genie Ball
programme.desc: Genie, Aladdin and Jamillah are playing an enchanted version of football - Genie Football! The Princess can hear all the fun from inside the palace and wishes she could join in but the Grand Vizier wont let her out. She sneaks out disguised as a washer woman and is quickly hit by the enchanted football. As soon as she touches it she falls into a deep slumber. Thats what happens when Princesses mess with Genie magic. Now they need to find a prince to kiss her and wake her up before the guards find her with our gang and arrest them for kidnapping. But Jamillah remembers that Aladdin will one day become a prince and convinces him to do it. Reluctantly he does and the princess wakes just before the palace guards burst in.

programme.title: Space-whale
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Less is More
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Darkside Of The Sun
programme.desc: When the sun goes out in the Zooniverse, Pancake learns to not be afraid of the dark. Let your imagination think happy things, not scary things.

programme.title: Iris Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Maple is jealous of everything Pancake gets to do because hes older, she sees a chance to be the oldest in the Zooniverse and grabs it. But being oldest isnt as simple as she thinks it will be. Understanding that you have different abilities and responsibilities at every age./Respecting your limits

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Aladdin unearths a bottle in his yard. On it is written Simsim - DO NOT OPEN. He and Jamillah are curious but Genie is downright terrified. He tells them that Simsim was banished from Genie School. Hes BAD. In a fearful state he tries to hide the bottle but ends up breaking it. Simsim is on the lose causing havoc in Baghdad and its up to Jamillah, Genie and Aladdin to stop him.

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: Good Luck, Bad Luck
programme.desc: The lucky amulet April has bought arrives in the mail. Pai and Xia make fun of her – until they see that April is suddenly top in every discipline. First Pai and then Xia steals her amulet, and whoever has it wins at everything. They are arguing over who should keep the amulet, when Maestro Woof reveals it wasn’t the amulet April bought at all. It was a pumice stone that he had ordered. The Guardians realize that good luck doesn’t depend on outside factors but comes from inside themselves.

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: Hello Pinkar!
programme.desc: Dada, an explorer, and his amazing Pinkar camping car crash in the Unknown Forest. He soon meets Bubbles, the forgetful fish, Caber, the know-it-all beaver, and Doubt, the happy mole. The sudden arrival of Dada and Pinkar ruins the presentation of Scottie Buddys new invention. So Scot, the self-proclaimed "greatest inventor of the Unknown Forest" and Piggy and Puggy, the crazy owl brothers, go to find out what has happened. As soon as Scot sets his eyes on Pinkar, its love at first sight. He decides he should have it for himself. He suggests having a race, Pinkar against Scottie Buddy, and the winner gets a wish. Motivated to win, Scot ends up going too fast, but when he tries to slow down he realizes he forgot to brake his invention. What will happen to Scot and who will win?

programme.title: Dunky's Laundry
programme.desc: GrandPa has entrusted Dunky to get his special Yellow shirt washed and ironed ready. Meanwhile a funny sequence of events and chase is happening between Cat and Keet.

programme.title: Vecinos en guerra
programme.desc: Una familia es adinerada, la otra es humilde. Son vecinos y se odian. Pero esto está a punto de cambiar.

programme.title: Vecinos en guerra
programme.desc: Una familia es adinerada, la otra es humilde. Son vecinos y se odian. Pero esto está a punto de cambiar.

programme.title: Vecinos en guerra
programme.desc: Una familia es adinerada, la otra es humilde. Son vecinos y se odian. Pero esto está a punto de cambiar.

programme.title: Salvar a Sandra
programme.desc: Una pareja lucha contra la industria farmacéutica para salvar a su hija diagnosticada con una rara enfermedad.

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD News Today
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD News Today

programme.title: Sayeaa Bahr
programme.desc: Director: Ali Ragab - Cast: Ahmed Helmy / Yasmin Abd El Aziz - Year of production: 2003

programme.title: Haha W Tofaha
programme.desc: Director: Akram Farid - Cast: Yasmin Abd El Aziz / Talat Zakaria - Year of production: 2006

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Sehmat
programme.desc: The story centers around a young woman named Sehmat, who is eagerly anticipating her Muklawa, a traditional Punjabi custom that marks the first meeting between a newlywed couple. Sehmat has been in love with her husband Joginder since they were married as children, and she is excited to finally be reunited with him. However, on the day of their Muklawa, Joginder, who is an army man, is called away to fight in a war. The film then follows the emotional journey of Sehmat and Joginder as they navigate the difficulties of their separation and the choices they must make in the face of war. Joginder is torn between his love for Sehmat and his duty to his country, ultimately choosing to put his country first. This decision leaves Sehmat feeling both sad and proud, as she realizes the sacrifice that Joginder has made for his country. Overall, the film appears to explore themes of love, sacrifice, and patriotism, set against the backdrop of a tumultuous and uncertain time in history.

programme.title: Rocket Bye Baby 1956
programme.desc: A cosmic mix-up results in a Martian baby being delivered to Earth, while an Earth baby is sent to Mars. Joseph Wilbur and his wife try to raise the green-skinned, ingenious Martian tyke as if he were an Earthling. But the kid builds his own spaceship and flies away, and Wilbur must find him and bring him back, or he'll never be able to make an exchange with the Martian parents for his own boy.

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: Aladdin and His Wonderful Lamp 1939
programme.desc: Working in the story department of Surprise Pictures, Olive Oyl writes a script based on the story of Aladdin, casting Popeye as the thief and herself as the Princess

programme.title: The Underground World-1943
programme.desc: Lois Lane and an explorer set out on an expedition through an underground cavern and discover a race of hawk-men. When these creatures prepare a ritual sacrifice for the adventurous pair, Superman comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Often an Orphan 1949
programme.desc: Charlie Dog tries everything to get Porky to take him in and he finally does. After a couple pranks the dog pound ends up picking up Porky and not the dog.

programme.title: I Don't Scare 1956
programme.desc: Popeye has beaten Bluto to a date with Olive. Seeing that Olive is superstitious, Bluto changes the date to Friday the 13th, and proceeds to rig various proofs that bad things will happen if she goes out.

programme.title: Felix Lends a Hand 1922
programme.desc: Trudging through the snow in his hometown, Felix sees a billboard advertising sunny Egypt, and says that he'd give four of his nine lives to be there rather than freezing in the snow. He then hears crying coming from his friend Abdul's carpet shop, and it turns out that Abdul's girlfriend has been kidnapped by an Egyptian sheik. Felix promises to rescue her, and hops on a magic carpet Abdul has lying around the shop, says the magic word and flies off to Egypt to keep his promise.

programme.title: Barnacle Bill 1930
programme.desc: Sailor Bimbo (as Barnacle Bill) jumps ship with his little black book and visits his lady friend, Betty Boop (with dog's ears).

programme.title: popeye meets ali babas forty thieves
Raw! Raw! Rooster 1956
programme.desc: Foghorn's annoying college buddy, Rhode Island Red, comes for a visit and then won't leave. What's worse, he muscles in on Foggy's harem and reverses most of Foggy's traps and tricks. A football session with an exploding casaba melon backfires when Red returns the pass; the exploding golf balls only explode when Foghorn hits them, and the fist in the camera only pops out when Foggy examines it to figure out what went wrong. But Foghorn finally gets the last laugh with a phony telegram about an inheritance and an exploding bowling ball as a parting gift.

programme.title: The Booze Hangs High-1930
programme.desc: Bosko has a grand time on the farm, dancing with a cow, playing a horse's tail like a violin and getting drunk with three pigs

programme.title: The Star of Bethlehem956
programme.desc: A nativity story animated with music performed by the Glyndeboume Festival Chorus.

programme.title: A Haul in One 1956
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto are, believe it or not, pals and partners in a moving company. (Maybe it's because Popeye isn't squinting here.) Anyhow, Olive has made the mistake of hiring them. She hasn't finished packing yet, so the boys, smitten as soon as she answers the door, compete to help her. Once packed, they compete to move more impressive piles of her belongings. Popeye easily wins these contests, even though Bluto locks him in the van at one point. At the end, Bluto socks Popeye into the piano, then into a table; though he hardly seems to need it, Popeye still eats his spinach, then thrashes Bluto.

programme.title: Back Stage-1919
programme.desc: Working their fingers to the bone to prepare the set for an upcoming performance, the enthusiastic stagehands, Roscoe and Buster, find themselves on stage when the cast quits. However, is will alone enough to earn a big round of applause?

programme.title: Meet John Doe- 1941
programme.desc: A penniless drifter (Gary Cooper) is recruited by an ambitious columnist (Barbara Stanwyck) to impersonate a non-existent person who said he'd be committing suicide as a protest, and a social movement begins.

programme.title: Bowery Blitzkrieg-1941

programme.title: Guest Yo-Yo
programme.desc: Yo-Yo is a rap star who’s become a cooking star. Her new TV show Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo lets us see her show off her creativity in a whole new way. We’re talking about food and cooking as well as Hip-Hop and the old days when she was rocking the mic.

programme.title: Guest Sylvia Waters
programme.desc: Ailey II Artistic Director Emerita, Sylvia Waters, talks working with Alvin Ailey and directing the Portrait of Ailey documentary series on PBS Learning.

programme.title: Guest Portia Allen-Kyle
programme.desc: Color Of Change's Portia Allen-Kyle discusses the organization's Black Tech Agenda for 2025.

programme.title: June 3, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for June 3, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guest Issa
programme.desc: Host Starr Rocque chats with rapper, singer and songwriter Issa about new music, his upcoming tour and more.

programme.title: Guest Shaun T
programme.desc: Shaun T is an amazing fitness trainer — the man behind Insanity — and he’s had a fascinating life. He goes deep into how he was sexually abused throughout his youth and how he’s become an inspiration to others and what you really should be doing to get the best workout you can.

programme.title: Guest Laura Stylez
programme.desc: Radio host Laura Stylez looks back on her early days in the industry, working under radio greats like Monie Love and Angie Martinez, dealing with crazy listeners, her Envsn Fest and the most valuable lesson life has taught her.

programme.title: I'm Not Stuck Unless I Stop
programme.desc: In “I’m Not Stuck Unless I Stop,” Pastor Steven unpacks the first mindset of his latest book, “Do The New You,” to teach us how to keep praising God before we see the victory.

programme.title: Christ Is In Me. I Am Enough.
programme.desc: I am enough because Christ is in me. Pastors Steven and Holly Furtick join forces to discuss breaking free of the trap of self-doubt and stepping confidently into our identity as children of God.

programme.title: WIth God There's Always A Way, And By Faith I Will Find It
programme.desc: In “With God There’s Always A Way, And By Faith I Will Find It,” Pastor Rich Wilkerson reminds us that our prayers might not be answered when or how we expect, but with God they will be better than we could have imagined.

programme.title: Rags To Righteous
programme.desc: There’s more God wants to do through you. In “Rags to Righteous!” Pastor Steven Furtick explains that God has a plan for every pit stop on the way to your purpose.
